attributes.action: ask his office to behave with some dignity and respect
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In a quest for even handedness ask No10 to accept a petition to deny Gordon Brown and Tony Blair a state funeral in the same tastelss way it accepted the same in connection with Baroness Thatcher or remove same and formally appologise

rejection.details:
An alternative to the petition you have mentioned has been set up. 

http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/BaronessThatcher/

If you would still like us to seriously consider your current petition 'apoorshow' please resubmit.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
